text.section: indicate their intention to the division to so participate;
present evidence, satisfactory to the division, of their qualifications to provide such services;
agree to accept, as payment in full, the amounts paid in accordance with the fee schedules provided for under this chapter;
agree to comply with all laws, rules and regulations governing the operation of the programs;
agree to be responsible for all overpayments owed to the division, including, in the case of transfer of ownership, the overpayments of any and all previous owners.
